commit.message:
Add githubAction to build & push docker image on github release published event. (#881)

fixes #880 üëç 

Update Dockerfile
- fix alpine image version
- add RELEASE_VERSION build arg

Add githubAction to build & push docker image on github release published event
- add github workflow file
- add dependabot file to automatically propose PRs on githubActions version update*

> ‚ö†Ô∏è *Note1: you will have to add `DOCKERHUB_USERNAME` and `DOCKERHUB_TOKEN` as github secrets in order for the 
> ‚ö†Ô∏è *Note2: github dependabot support must be enabled in order for this action to work
githubAction to be able to login to the dockerHub and push images on it üëç
> *Note3:  we can add other dependabot entries in order to update Go modules and Dockerfile base images üëç (i.e `FROM` parts)

Add githubAction to build & push docker image on github release published event. (#881)

fixes #880 üëç 

Update Dockerfile
- fix alpine image version
- add RELEASE_VERSION build arg

Add githubAction to build & push docker image on github release published event
- add github workflow file
- add dependabot file to automatically propose PRs on githubActions version update*

> ‚ö†Ô∏è *Note1: you will have to add `DOCKERHUB_USERNAME` and `DOCKERHUB_TOKEN` as github secrets in order for the 
> ‚ö†Ô∏è *Note2: github dependabot support must be enabled in order for this action to work
githubAction to be able to login to the dockerHub and push images on it üëç
> *Note3:  we can add other dependabot entries in order to update Go modules and Dockerfile base images üëç (i.e `FROM` parts)
